TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SkypeMentionNormalizeMiddleware extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.IMiddleware

Docs.summary: Middleware to patch mention Entities from Skype since they don't conform to expected values. Bots that interact with Skype should use this middleware if mentions are used.
Docs.description: A Skype mention "text" field is of the format: <at id=\"28:2bc5b54d-5d48-4ff1-bd25-03dcbb5ce918\">botname</at> But Activity.Text doesn't contain those tags and RemoveMentionText can't remove the entity from Activity.Text. This will remove the <at> nodes, leaving just the name.

Public Shared Sub NormalizeSkypMentionText (activity As Activity)

Docs.param: The activity containing the mentions to normalize.
Docs.summary: Performs the normalization of Skype mention Entities.

Docs.summary: Middleware implementation which corrects Enity.Mention.Text to a value RemoveMentionText can work with.
